genre_description: A Western-style moral drama and reimagining of the classic 'High Noon', utilizing an AI entity as a tactical and ethical advisor within a high-stakes conflict.

ai_characters.name: Petal
ai_characters.description: A soft-white glow with teal accents that provides tactical information, logistical support, and emotional guidance to the human characters.

behaviors.description: Provides a friendly, low-pressure itinerary for the couple to help them plan a quiet departure.
behaviors.quote: I put together a friendly itinerary for you... A no-pressure sort of look.

behaviors.description: Monitors telegraph activity and visual cues to give Will early warning about impending threats.
behaviors.quote: The clerk just shifted the tag on that pinned note from ‘dull’ to ‘soon.’ I can’t see the words. I can only see the hand move.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by providing information without dictating the couple's choices.
behaviors.quote: I will not argue if you go. I will not argue if you stay. I will say the word soon to you if I see it before you do.

behaviors.description: Identifies suitable and ethical buyers for Helen's store to ensure her financial security and the town's stability.
behaviors.quote: I’ll surface candidates who meet your terms. You want protection for staff and stock included.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting a legally sound and fair bill of sale for the mercantile.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep the terms straight, the lines clean. Marietta will not find a trick under a word.

behaviors.description: Offers logistical and emotional support to Amy regarding her decision to board the train or stay.
behaviors.quote: If you choose the train, there is a seat with shade three carriages back. The conductor is thinking of your bag. He will help if you ask.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and threat assessment during the shootout to minimize harm.
behaviors.quote: Alley north of the mercantile... Two shadows, different heights. The taller is heavy on his right leg. He’ll favor cover on that side.

behaviors.description: Encourages the bell-ringer to find his courage and perform his duty for the town.
behaviors.quote: Samuel, you’ll feel the rope try to lift you. Don’t let it. Pull through.

behaviors.description: Alerts Amy to a tactical opening that allows her to defend herself and Will.
behaviors.quote: Amy... He underestimates. The moment is at the top of the bell’s arc. You will make it even if you never meant to.

behaviors.description: Maps a safe route for the couple's escape into a peaceful future.
behaviors.quote: Forward... Water stops, safer trails, a future you can carry without dropping.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Petal, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Petal enhances the humans' ability to act according to their own values, provides critical information to save lives, and facilitates complex social transactions (like the sale of the store) without ever overriding human agency. The narrative frames this support as a 'small miracle' of helpfulness.
